dct_title_s: Mittel- und Nord-Africa (oestl. Theil) und Arabien
dct_description_sm: Map shows Libya, Egypt, Nubia, Habesch [Abyssinia], Darfur, the lands occupied by the Galla [Oromo], Somalia, Gulf of Aden, Red Sea and countries further North including Arabia, Iran, Afghanistan and Kurdistan.
"Ausg. in 63 Bl. No. LIII. Stieler's Hand-Atlas (No. 45b)".
Bar scale on map given in "Deutsche Meilein."

Inset map: Habesch [Abyssinia] showing regions including Tigre, Amhara, Shoa, the lands of the Galla, towns, villages, rivers, roads, lakes and mountain ranges. Inset bar scale indicates 1 inch per 30 Deutsche Meilen [1:900 000]. Adjacent to the inset is a topographical depiction of a mountain range including heights.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
